sys_ui_page.html:
var jobId = "${sysparm_sysID}"; var jobs = new GlideRecord('x_snc_coe_audit_job'); if(jobs.get(jobId)) { var Streams = new GlideRecord('sys_template'); Streams.addEncodedQuery('table=x_snc_coe_sh_audit_task^name='+jobs.job_type.getDisplayValue()); Streams.query(); }
Please select at least one Process Stream
sys_ui_page.name: add_pension_sh_task
